docs.text: Peter Luro Personal Microsite About Me I am a Software Engineer with over three years of professional software engineering experience developing ML pipelines, automating tasks in azure cloud, and scripting data processing functionality. I have developed Jenkins automation pipelines, which run scheduled security checks on various pieces of architecture in all of the organization's projects with automated emailing alerts. Other pipelines include automating the deployment of Kubernetes resources, such as APIs which can interact with other services and deployments. Education Worcester Polytechnic Institute (WPI) Bachelor of Science in Computer Science, GPA: 3.65/4.0
